main.name: Vaishnav Gangarapu
main.description: Core competencies lying in User Experience/User Interface, Data and Web Analytics

resume.skillmessage: Core skills lie around Full Stack Web Development and Site Traffic Data Analysis, Worked on eCommerce websites to gain knowledge on the supply chain management, content and commerce

education.description: The four years of college was a lot more that just Academic excellence, held various positions of responsibilities and was fortunate enough to travel to Shanghai for Intern in the Summer of 2017, gave a lot of exposure and learning

Being a student in a Kendriya Vidyalaya helped an overall development, and the school being in the heart of the city, I got a chance to participate in many competitions like the TCS wiz quiz, Youth Parliaments, National level Olympiads and Art and Painting competitions which gave me an exposure around a various other aspects of student learning. I enthusiastically participated in all the Science and Social Science exhibitions. Learnt Basketball under dynamic coaching of well trained coach and played many tournaments.

work.title: Business Technology Analyst
work.description: Belong to the Customer and Marketing Division of Deloitte Consulting, core expertise lying in creating and enhancing User Experience and User Interface of the e-commerce domain and worked for adding e-commerce platform for Clients from various industries like TMT/TMC and Entertainment.

testimonials.text: Vaishnav, your ability to quickly learn new technologies is amazing and you delivered stories same as other senior team members. You have taken the entire responsibility on ADA implementation. Really appreciate your great work and keep it up! Thank you!
Vaishnav has demonstrated great commitment  and hardwork in taking care of the Analytics implementation and has owned the worked related to Accessibility track, Thank you for being Awesome
